subject: Attn:Dear
body:
Attn:Dear
 
Your file appears in my desk two days ago Through the office of IMF  That you are among people approved to be paid half of their payment of USD$8 million dollars. Signed by the United Nation Secretary General,I need your above information,to confirm with the one we have already here in our file,if you are the rightful owner to be paid.
 
Full Name
Contact Address
Phone Number
 
Thanks and God bless.
 
Regards
Robtson Gray
REPLY TO 
robtsongray@aol.com

subject: Re:   Attn:Dear
body:
Hello Robtson Gray,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I'm quite surprised to hear about this approval from the United Nations Secretary and IMF. Could you please provide more details about this? How did my name come up in this process?

Looking forward to hearing from you.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
James

subject: Reconfirmation of your details
body:
Attn James

I write to acknowledge you that I receive your information today, your information has been scrutinized orderly and I have forwarded your information to (IMF) head office. The IMF head office will forward your file to paying Bank, to approve your part payment of $8million USD.

We need your details such as:

Full Name:

Contact Address;

id Copy:

Phone Number

Occupation/ Position:

Company Name;

Age:

Sex:

Further details for transfer

Bank Name
Bank Address
Account Name
Account Number
Routing Number

Thanks and God bless.
Regards


Robtson Gray
robtsongray@aol.com

subject: Re: Reconfirmation of your details
body:
Hello James,

I'm delighted to hear from you and appreciate the update on my file. It's good to know that everything is in order and has been forwarded to the IMF head office.

I'm curious about the process. Could you please explain a bit more about how it works? How does the IMF head office coordinate with the paying bank?

Also, I'd like to understand better what my role is in this process. What do I need to do next? 

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
James
